summary: A yakuza melodrama, covering decades in the lives of Boss Onimasa, his adopted daughter Matsue, and his biological daughter Hanako.
cast: Tatsuya Nakadai|Masako Natsume|Akiko Nakamura|Akiko Kana|Mari Natsuki|Kaori Takasugi|Emi Shindô|Ryôhei Uchida|Katsuhiko Watabiki|Eitarô Ozawa|Naoya Makoto|Asaji Kokontei|Nobuko Sendô|Hiroshi Iwashita|Minoru Uchida|Shôtarô Hayashi|Torahiko Hamada|Ken'ichi Matsuno|Masataka Iwao|Ikuko Shimizu|Tamaki Miyagawa|Kôji Yakusho|Tetsurô Tanba|Tôru Masuoka|Mineko Maruhira|Hiroshi Ôkawa|Tankurô|Yoshinobu Hirose|Gorô Ôki|Minoru Sakurai|Kenzô Katsuno|Takanori Oya|Seishirô|Yukio Miyagi|Shunji Sasaki|Rin Tsunami|Toshiya Maruyama|Kayoko Tominaga|Gentarô Mori|Rantaro Mine|Seizô Fukumoto|Junpei Arishima|Shunichi Nakajima|Shôtarô Ôtsuki|Shinichi Hori|Kôzô Kotani|Kenji Ikeda|Yoshiki Yamada|Hideo Murota|Mikio Narita|Tatsuo Umemiya|Kei Yamamoto|Isao Natsuyagi|Shima Iwashita|Isamu Ago|Kinzô Sakura|Masahiko Tanimura
title: Kiryûin Hanako no shôgai
